test.input: Katniss Everdeen is a person who likes cats.
test.output: ClassAssertion(ObjectIntersectionOf(Class(Person person) ObjectSomeValuesFrom(ObjectProperty(like likes) Class(Cat cats))) NamedIndividual(KatnissEverdeen Katniss Everdeen))

test.input: Katniss is a person who likes cats.
test.output: ClassAssertion(ObjectIntersectionOf(Class(Person person) ObjectSomeValuesFrom(ObjectProperty(like likes) Class(Cat cats))) NamedIndividual(Katniss Katniss))

test.input: Lily Potter and Petunia Dursley are persons.
Han Solo and Chewbacca are not trustworthy smugglers.
test.output: ClassAssertion(ObjectComplementOf(ObjectIntersectionOf(Class(Smuggler smugglers) DataHasBoolValue(DataProperty(isTrustworthy XSD_BOOLEAN is trustworthy) true))) NamedIndividual(HanSolo Han Solo))
ClassAssertion(ObjectComplementOf(ObjectIntersectionOf(Class(Smuggler smugglers) DataHasBoolValue(DataProperty(isTrustworthy XSD_BOOLEAN is trustworthy) true))) NamedIndividual(Chewbacca Chewbacca))

test.input: Lily Potter is a wizard, but Petunia Dursley is a muggle.
Leia Organa is a beautiful woman.
test.output: ClassAssertion(ObjectIntersectionOf(Class(Woman woman) DataHasBoolValue(DataProperty(isBeautiful XSD_BOOLEAN is beautiful) true)) NamedIndividual(LeiaOrgana Leia Organa))

test.input: Han Solo is not a honest smuggler.
test.output: ClassAssertion(ObjectComplementOf(ObjectIntersectionOf(Class(Smuggler smuggler) DataHasBoolValue(DataProperty(isHonest XSD_BOOLEAN is honest) true))) NamedIndividual(HanSolo Han Solo))
